mapper.sql:
select course_no, course_summary, course_name, course_subject, course_level, course_time, course_totalperson, course_room, course_plan, course_pay, course_registerdate, course_status, course_startdate, course_enddate, a.teacher_no, b.teacher_name from course a inner join teacher b on a.teacher_no = b.teacher_no
course_status like '모집중'
and 1=1
and course_level like '1~2학년'
and course_level like '3~4학년'
and course_level like '5~6학년'
mapper.select: SELECT course_no, course_summary, course_name, course_subject, course_level, course_time, course_totalperson, course_room, course_plan, course_pay, to_char(course_registerdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as course_registerdate, course_status, to_char(course_startdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as course_startdate, to_char(course_enddate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as course_enddate, a.teacher_no, b.teacher_name FROM course a inner join teacher b on a.teacher_no = b.teacher_no WHERE course_no = #{course_no}
